title: Audrey Cordon-Ragot: ‘I feared for my teammates’ lives on Tour Féminin Pyrénées’
content:
The French champion is targeting a a free role at the Tour de France Femmes avec Zwift this summer.

Read the full article at Audrey Cordon-Ragot: ‘I feared for my teammates’ lives on Tour Féminin Pyrénées’ on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
